meanings.definition: Extend or stretch out to full length.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys outstretching her arms in the morning sun.
meanings.sent2: The cat is outstretching its body while waking up from a nap.
meanings.sent3: The tree seemed to be outstretching its branches to catch the falling leaves.
meanings.sent4: His ambition was like outstretching a hand towards the unreachable stars.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's outstretching movements captivated the audience.

meanings.definition: To reach out or extend beyond a certain point.
meanings.sent1: The river was outstretching its banks after heavy rain.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's legs were outstretching as he crossed the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The vines in the garden were outstretching towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her influence was outstretching to every corner of the community.
meanings.sent5: The shadows were outstretching across the field as the sun set.
